post.text: "We don't miss voting in my family." A story from the 1992 presidential campaign that President Bill Clinton will never forget:

comment.author: Ethan
comment.text: It doesn't matter what's said or how many Republicans are jumping ship, or unedited video coverage. If Trumpeteers are blind to all of the plethora of credible evidence out there, then they deserve to go over the edge of the cliff with the Trump train wreck

replies.author: Ricki
replies.text: Chicago Tribune, liberal ground zero, is calling for her to step down for the sake of the party. Read it yourself. http://tiny.iavian.net/d8kh

replies.author: Mary Beth
replies.text: Well, the FBI now has a warrant to investigate Huma Abedins laptop and other devices. Folks, if Hillary is elected, we will have a Constitutional crisis to live thru that will make Watergate look like childs play. During the Watergate fiasco, the OPEC countries hit us with the Oil Embargo which crippled our economy for years. Do you really want to take that chance with Hillary and our country being severely damaged??? THINK BEFORE YOU VOTE. No scare tactics here....just fact. I lived thru Watergate and our country suffered greatly. DO NOT PUT OUR COUNTRY THRU THAT AGAIN PLEASE.!!!!
